value.name: Fresno Police arrest two men for a pair of home invasions
value.description: 22-year-old Travis Griffin was arrested in August. 24-year-old Kenneth Bash was arrested Monday night. Police say the pair was involved in two home invasion robberies on July 12th. Both in Central ...

value.name: MacDill Defenders celebrate National Police Week
value.description: MACDILL AIR FORCE BASE, Fla. -- Airmen from the 6th Security Forces Squadron celebrated National Police Week here, May 9-15, 2021, honoring all defenders who have fallen in the line of duty.
